item.title: Sainkho Namtchylak
item.description: 擁有獨特的嗓音，一位具有個人特色的藝術音樂家 Sainkho Namtchylak - 《Old Melodie》 Sainkho Namtchylak (俄羅斯歌手) 是非常具有個人特色的藝術音樂家， 獨特的嗓音是與生

item.title: The Sound of Silence
item.description: Hello darkness, my old friend. The Sound Of Silence Hello darkness, my old friend, this is lyrics. 今天用經典老歌，以破題的歌詞的方式來介紹這首顛覆歌名的好音樂。 原唱版本為1964年Simon & Garfun

item.title: 1121 Martin Garrix
item.description: A famous DJ in Netherlands. Martin Garrix is a DJ in Netherlands. His latest single “Forever” is his massive collaboration with Matisse & Sadko. It opened with heart-aching chords on a church organ(教堂風琴) and decked out with melancholy guitar licks[1]. The video for Garrix’s latest
